segments.text: Hello . I need to disconnect my phone , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Where do you live , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . Why do you want to disconnect your phone , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m moving to a new home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: O . K . May I have your name please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Mr . Smith . What ’ s your telephone number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Where should I send your final phone bill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 623 West Side Drive . New York , New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Mr . Smith . Your phone will be disconnected after this phone call . Have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S2
